description: ERECTION OF A TWO STOREY EXTENSION ON SOUTH SIDE OF EXISTING HOUSE TO PROVIDE KITCHEN  UTILITY ROOM  BEDROOM AND BATHROOM TOGETHER WITH A SINGLE STOREY EXTENSION ON NORTH EASTERN SIDE OF HOUSE TO PROVIDE A GARAGE.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The garage(s) and/or car parking space(s) shown on the approved drawing garage shall be provided before commencement of the use of the land or building(s) hereby permitted and thereafter shall be kept free from obstruction and shall not be used for purposes other than the parking of vehicles in conjunction with the development hereby permitted.

Condition : 3 - The proposed tree planting/landscaping scheme(indicated on the deposited plan) shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval and be implemented during the next planting season after the completion of building operations on the site, or within such longer period as may be approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - Before the building/extension hereby permitted is first occupied, the windows in the extensions elevation of the shall be glazed with obscured glass and shall be maintained as such thereafter.
Condition : 5 - The proposed window on the west elevation of the two storey extension at first floor level shall be permanently glazed with obscure glass.
